traffic_visible_response: Sensitive Words are words or phrases that are considered sensitive or inappropriate in certain contexts These words can include slang profanity dialects abusive language or any other terms that might be considered offensive controversial or inappropriate in specific settings In the field of text processing and content management sensitive words are often filtered out or replaced to ensure that the content is appropriate and respectful Tools and algorithms are used to detect and handle these sensitive words allowing for the protection of user privacy and the prevention of the spread of harmful information For example in some online platforms or applications there may be a system in place to detect and filter out sensitive words in user generated content This helps to maintain a positive and respectful environment for all users In summary sensitive words refer to words or phrases that are considered sensitive or inappropriate and are often filtered out or replaced in text processing and content management
